replies.body:
True.

But weird.


I notice many people say that it makes them depressed.

I honestly don't feel that way.


But it is still partly true which, you have to admit.


We all depart this realm and enter the next.

If we never die, we would be gods eh?

Even if it seems terrible, everyone leaves minecraft. No matter how much you love it. That's what makes games so valuable. Do what you want while you can. Do what YOU want to do.

replies.body: Minecraft was based off a block version of real life so I would presume it's quite alike with a few tweaks to make it more interesting i.e Enderdragon, Wither and the Nether.
